Title: Prohibits a court from ordering certain physical examinations of the victim of a sexual assault and relates to the admissibility of evidence of the refusal of such victim to undergo such examinations
Summary: Prohibits a court from ordering certain physical examinations of the victim of a sexual assault; relates to the admissibility of evidence of the refusal of such victim to undergo such examinations.
LawCode: Add ยง60.49, CP L; amd ยง3121, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to prohibiting a court from ordering certain physical examinations of the victim of a sexual assault and to the admissibility of evidence of the refusal of such victim to undergo such examinations
